Reviews.Title: “my last stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Truedreamer
Reviews.Content: spent night ariston hotel april 2012 business trip arriving late hotel close termini train station move easier following day using metro opted hotel easy reach foot train station elegant quiet decent hotel modern clean beds nice bathroom twin tv complimentary coffee available self service breakfast included rate special start day missed cappuccino serve coffee automatic machine service efficient warm easy parking

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but service need to be improved”
Reviews.Author: MarcoS333
Reviews.Content: stayed october partner daysthe location ideal close termini station vatican modern didn´t wait check oknothing special overall satisfied reception staff polite visit

Reviews.Title: “Not so Fantastico!”
Reviews.Author: Graham S Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: cetainly booking process shambles available booked 6 months earlier ensure availability notwithstanding queue line people complaining reception staff doing plesant times location close termini meant short taxi ride rome district sketchy served purposes watching rugby return 2 looking alternatives

Reviews.Title: “perfect!!!”
Reviews.Author: stauros s
Reviews.Content: experience hotel ariston rome indeed unforgettable traveler friendliness people reception help whatever stay commend beautiful remarkably clean towels sheets bathroom supplies changed daily giving pleasant refreshing feeling time return hotel leaving intense overwhelming italian capital time rich tasteful breakfast energy morning continue exploring enjoying eternal city

Reviews.Title: “Fell short of our expectation.”
Reviews.Author: First time Trav... . Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: near train station disappointed 1 bathroom drainage poor shower water drained fast resulting overflowing bedroom 2 noisy street below sleep 3 repeated requests water boiler provided 4 squeezy hardly move classified 4star hotelfor cost euro paid 5 night stay receive breakfast 10 euro person normal cots 15 note kindly display names time traveller melbourne thanks

Reviews.Title: “Too small rooms for a hotel with so many stars”

Reviews.Content: reserved 2 st valentines offer included breakfast bottle wine didnt 2 waiting quarter terrible hot airconditioning didnt complained offered de night expect hotel stars childeren slept 2 nights hotelroom terrible bottles wine didnt
